text: James Tien (born 28 May 1942) is a Hong Kong retired actor. He appeared in almost 70 films, primarily in Hong Kong action cinema, including roles in the films of martial arts stars including Bruce Lee, Jackie Chan and Sammo Hung. He often played villains or supporting roles. He retired from the Hong Kong movie industry in 1996. == Related pages== * James Tien in The Game of Death Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Hong Kong actors Category:20th-century Chinese actors
title: James Tien
